A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: No idea why this has such a high score from the critics\, oh wait\, yes I do\, it's because critics are usually wrong.  This Star Wars film left me confused and sad.  So many bad decisions were made that completely ruined the characters we've grown to love over the years.  What is really depressing for me is I am not excited for the next one at all\, and that sucks since I absolutely love Star Wars.
